td.content: s:67 year old white male surveyor with moderate weak urinary stream, moderate urinary hesitancy, moderate urinary dribbling and Diabetes. he has had several such episodes over past 2 years. he denies ever using cigarettes Alcohol 1-4 beers/month o:Height 66 in, Weight 171 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, HbA1c HbA1c=9 %, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, age-appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a:Type 2 Diabetes p:administered glimepiride - 4 mg daily, performed HbA1c, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Term.SYMPTOM: Delay when starting to pass urine
